metadata.Name: DaNetQA
metadata.Description: DaNetQA is a Russian language yes/no question answering dataset based on Wikipedia articles.
metadata.Paper Title: DaNetQA: a yes/no Question Answering Dataset for the Russian Language
metadata.Abstract: We present DaNetQA, a new Russian language question answering dataset designed for yes/no questions. The dataset consists of 10,000 question-answer pairs based on Russian Wikipedia articles. Questions are formulated in a natural language style and require reasoning about the content of the corresponding article to answer correctly. We provide a detailed analysis of the dataset, including statistics on question length, answer distribution, and the types of reasoning required to answer the questions. We also evaluate the performance of several state-of-the-art question answering models on DaNetQA, demonstrating that the dataset presents a challenging benchmark for Russian language question answering.
